channel.title: Obsidian PDF++
channel.generator: Webpage HTML Export plugin for Obsidian
channel.dc:creator: Ryota Ushio

item.title: Home
item.description:
Welcome to the official documentation of the Obsidian PDF++ plugin!
PDF++ is the most Obsidian-native PDF annotation & editing tool ever, which significantly upgrades Obsidian's native PDF support.
Visit GitHub
Support Development Maintaining this plugin is not an easy work; it requires investigating Obsidian's unexposed internals, the knowledge of the technical specification of the PDF file format and PDF-related libraries, and more. Therefore, your financial support is crucial for ensuring PDF++ can help you organize your knowledge base for the years to come. If you find this plugin helpful, please support the project from the links below.
One-time donations are much appreciated. However, monthly donations will help me even more by providing a constant source of income.
If you prefer PayPal, please make donations from Ko-fi. GitHub Sponsors:
Buy Me a Coffee:
Ko-fi:
item.dc:creator: Ryota Ushio
